item.title: Revisited: Blog changes, etc.
item.description: I’ve once more moved my blog. This time, it’s on my own hosting account and it’s back to using WP. Same blog, different flavor now and moving forward.

item.title: Honor God, Make Disciples
item.description: A couple of months ago, I started attending this workshop/training for leaders at Victory CDO. It’s called Training for Victory (T4V), and it was a once-a-week engagement for about 10 weeks; although it took longer than that because of several holidays around that time.
